mapper.select: Set @sortNoStart := #{SortNoStart}, @sortNoLength := #{SortNoLength}, @RN := 0; Select x.*, ConCat('(', x.R_ADRS_ZIP, ')', ' ', x.R_ADRS) R_FULL_ADRS, ( Select Count(*) From ( Select n.* From ( Select a.* From THPTK_SERVICE_REQ a ) n Where 1 = 1 And ConCat_WS('^', n.R_CPN_NM, n.R_BIZ_NO) Like ConCat('%', #{CondText}, '%') ) m ) TOT_CN, ( Select Count(*) From ( Select n.* From ( Select a.* From THPTK_SERVICE_REQ a ) n Where 1 = 1 And ConCat_WS('^', n.R_CPN_NM, n.R_BIZ_NO) Like ConCat('%', #{CondText}, '%') ) m ) FILTERED_CN From ( Select a.*, @RN := @RN + 1 ROW_NUM From THPTK_SERVICE_REQ a Where 1 = 1 Order By a.R_DTTM Desc ) x Where 1 = 1 And x.ROW_NUM Between @sortNoStart + 1 And @sortNoStart + @sortNoLength And ConCat_WS('^', x.R_CPN_NM, x.R_BIZ_NO) Like ConCat('%', #{CondText}, '%');
